text: Taipei Arena is a metro station on the Songshan-Xindian Line in Taipei, Taiwan. The station code is G17. == Station layout information == The platforms are located underground. Platform 1 is for Songshan. Platform 2 is for Xindian or Taipower Building. == Around the station == * Taipei Arena * Land Reform Museum Category:Railway stations in Taipei
title: Taipei Arena metro station
